title: Sweet touch to NYC !!
text: I spent a quick weekend with my girlfriend in NYC at this place and we both LOVED it! We booked last minute and got a great rate.... our room was so cozy we didn't want to leave. The staff, especially Sakena, were delightful, quick to help and got us a car booked when we left. Like a great home. See you again 414. Best of Luck!
